thread.title: Alhassan Wakaso helps Rio Ave breeze pass Union FC in Portuguese Cup
thread.title_full: Alhassan Wakaso helps Rio Ave breeze pass Union FC in Portuguese Cup

title: Alhassan Wakaso helps Rio Ave breeze pass Union FC in Portuguese Cup
text:
14:25 CET Alhassan Wakaso helps Rio Ave breeze pass Union FC in Portuguese Cup - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghana midfielder Alhassan Wakaso battling for the ball with Bernard Mensah 
Highly rated Ghanaian midfielder Alhassan Wakaso continued his solid start to the season with another effective display to help his side to a comfortable 3-0 victory over Union FC in the Portuguese league. 
Wakaso, is enjoying his best start to life in the Portuguese league this season and transferred the rich vein of form to the Portuguese Cup over the weekend. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
